Summary: two triangles slowley move toward my house
divs: Sighting Details went out to smoke cigerette when i saw two what i assumed were helicopters as the got closer i didnt hear them and it was more like two triangles coasting at pretty low and slow altitudes. took 3or4 pics with bberrry phone. then ran two get digital camera but only got two shots off one not good other i erased i guess. but i sent the pics from bb to my email and enlarged them and i describe as it gets bigger. it goes from being light to lets say a casper the friendly gost blob and then it was weird like i dont now how to give it a good description. almost like a sea hoarse shape and long faced scull with bright light inside and then resolution gets bad with differrent colors. You can have them if you like.. oh yea it started out east (cedar hills radio wire area as it is about to go over my house it veered to right or north. i can send you pics later if requested ... thanks ill have to look at the rest of this form later it is too late.
